extendedInfo.description: "Give it a blast and rediscover what going digital almost made us all forget â thereâs more to music." Life of AndroidAlready more than 10,000 users have used Xound, why wouldn't you be the next? Xound is an amazing new music player designed to be beautiful, fast and intuitive, while keeping the best features out there. Are you ready to rediscover your favorites artists ?/!\ This is a free trial version which will only last one week !Here are some of its key functionalities :â¢ Xound automatically downloads the lyrics of your music when playingâ¢ Allows you to read short biographies of your artistsâ¢ And shows their photos thanks to its grid interfaceâ¢ Shake your phone to shuffleâ¢ Has it own integrated equalizerâ¢ Xound can be controlled by your headphones buttonâ¢ A beautiful interface fully integrated to Androidâ¢ Uses little batteryâ¢ Allows researches in the libraryâ¢ A desktop app-widget for quick access to Xoundâ¢ Social media playing via Last.fm scrobbling (you need to install scrobbledroid)â¢ Or share your discoveries on facebook/twitter/mail/sms etc...â¢ Always keep an eye on what is currently playing with the notification iconAnd so many other things... Just try it !

reviews.title: Promising
reviews.comment: Edit:My Trial is over, so I can not check new improved version, but I gave It another star just for replying and showing that U care for our input. Thank You & Keep up the good work! Kind Regards from Slovenia. --- Old comment: Like the swipe and lyrics...make it pause on incoming call and I\'ll add another star...looking forward...+ add exit option... and no icon in status bar please..
reviews.author: Barbara Kodrin

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says it will. Recommended app.
reviews.author: Barry Walton

reviews.title: Best music player
reviews.comment: Awesome app!!
reviews.author: Adarsh Iyer

reviews.title: Good audio player
reviews.comment: Finds all your music really quickly. Good layout. Could be louder though. Worth comparing it to your current audio app player.
reviews.author: Peter Johnstone

reviews.title: Very accurate
reviews.comment: It works well I like it
reviews.author: Carlyn La perdidaXcX

reviews.title: Not Bad
reviews.comment: I like the layout of the App and quality of the sound. On my Transformer T201 Xounds only seems to display in portrait so I have to lay my head on my left shoulder to use the App. More of my stars will come with a little development
reviews.author: geoff moritimer

reviews.title: Wow this application works at my HTC ONE V
reviews.comment: Please ad equalizers
reviews.author: khathu tshikosi

reviews.title: S3 owner
reviews.comment: Love it and works amazing
reviews.author: Ivan Spindola

reviews.title: Not sure
reviews.comment: Reviews are bad but I have no problems expect for some force closes on my nexus but If this up date fixes that I\'ll buy the app and rate 5 stars.currently on trial. Update: dev replied and bugs fixed. I\'ll be trying it again
reviews.author: Ahmed Kadir

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: Works on my Nexus 7 but not at all on my Galaxy S3
reviews.author: francis mcgoldrick

reviews.comment: Nothing great at all doesn\'t let you play whole tracks pretty boring why would I pay.
reviews.author: David Maynard

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Forxe close...
reviews.author: JAHANGIR KHAN

reviews.title: Magnifique
reviews.comment: Really very nice player. Beautiful interface and really great sound. Could be more complete but as a start it\'s really very impressive.
reviews.author: Peter Andro

reviews.title: Nice interface but....
reviews.comment: Nice interface but nothing special which is not being offered by free players... Would not pay for this...
reviews.author: Mehul Siddhpura

reviews.comment: Force close
reviews.author: Daniel Sutfin

reviews.title: Well Not Open
reviews.comment: Will not launch on my Galaxy Note running CM10.1. Just force closes. I do not have that problem with any other music player.
reviews.author: Charles Brown

reviews.title: Nice but...
reviews.comment: It has potential for sure, but in order to make money must be a free app for a while. Try adds instead of trial.
reviews.author: Martin Maksimovski

reviews.title: Works for me
reviews.comment: Quite impressed. But album cover takes up two thirds of the screen leaving one third for lyrics. Needs to be customisable or lyrics overlaying album cover. Pretty slick if not slightly basic as it is.
reviews.author: Damian Hodgson

reviews.title: Can\'t even try it
reviews.comment: CRAP APP!   Forces closed every attempt to access it.  Samsung Note 2
reviews.author: Brian Morton

reviews.title: Needs to do better
reviews.comment: Good sound,needs a little more bass and needs more volume to go louder if it wants to compete with other players,  other than that its an ok player. Just needs some boom to it.Get some loud boom boom and bass i will switch players.Looking for one that has less bugs but your player has no boom boom. Like the one i have now.
reviews.author: Eric C
